entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers early in the morning. Rain beginning in the morning. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle. Fog patches developing in the evening. Amount 5 mm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Sunday 30 April 2023
